introduction: Ca détourne (ou "Le Triomphe de Bali Balo" ; ou "La Splendeur de la Honte" ; ou "L'Invasion des Pervers Polymorphes")written and directed by Michel Hazanavicius, Daniel Lambert and Dominique Mézeretteproduced by Eve Vercel, Robert Nador and Michel Lecourt39 min, color, Canal+/DUNE/Warner Bros Televisionwith Valérie Payet, Philippe Dana and many know actors ...Valérie Payet and Philippe Dana are playing with Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Steve Mac Queen,  Burt Lancaster, etc..
